A gun and bomb attack on a university in northwestern Pakistan...
...killed at least 20 people and wounded dozens more.
Officials in Afghanistan say a suicide car bomb blast near the Russian Embassy...
...in the capital Kabul has killed at least seven people.
Government forces battle with the Islamic State...
...in the strategic Syrian city of Deir al-Zor.
In the United States, government scientists say...
...2015 was the warmest year ever recorded.
And finally, also from the United States, California Institute of Technology scientists...
...say they have found a possible ninth planet in our galaxy beyond Neptune.
